{{Tbotfasoundtrack}}
'''The Gathering of the Clouds''' is the sixth track of disc one of ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' and [[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack - Special Edition|special edition soundtrack]], by [[Howard Shore]].
